DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Events Domain Collection CDISC Variable Terminology Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date and time of specimen collection

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Events Domain Biospecimen Collection Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An events domain that documents biospecimen collection and storage information._Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
